attributes.action: Ban immigration for persons entering the uk from countries with known terrorist activities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a matter of fact that many countries around the world have major populations that produce and support radical ideology. Our government needs to put immigration sanctions on countries that support and or continue to produce terrorists preventing anybody from these nations entering the UK as a matter of national security. The government also needs to enforce rulings on UK persons visiting these nations, to prevent them from gaining the necessary training in order to commit or conspire to commit terrorist activities in the UK
